tool_description: Climate change news all around the world
name: climate-change-api-mamc
title: climate-change-api-mamc

api_list.name: Get individual sources of information about Climate Change
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about Climate Change
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-api-mamc.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-api-mamc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

print(response.json())
